page.title: 13TRAFFIC IN OUR AREA
page.content: We made a{census}of all the traffic which came into the{Horrabridge area from Tavistock,Plymouth,Whitchurch,and Yelverton on a{Thursday}morning between 08.00 and 09.00, which is the rush hour when most people travel.We found out some interesting trends. Most people come to the village from the main Tavistock road using cars.Lorries rarely travel during the early morning and local buisnesses are suppiled by van.Few people use motorbike or bicycle and there was only one public service bus.It was noticed that far more cars leave {Horrabridge}at this time than enter it,we think this is because many people travel to Plymouth to work. We expect that in the evening more cars would be found returning to the village area.
